column2:
"Ah, it's you.
Could you entertain Rela for me?"
"Light is running away again. He gets frightened everytime Rela greets him with a roar. I'll drag him back here."

"〔<%me>〕
〔A question〕〔Please〕"

"〔Am I〕〔that frightening〕
〔to ARKS?〕"

"〔I have〕〔Seen many〕
〔Frightened ARKS〕〔Run away〕
〔...Quna too〕〔Initially frightened〕"

"〔I feel〕〔Slightly sad〕
〔I am〕〔Frightening〕
〔Scary〕〔Not at all〕"

"〔I want〕〔to speak with〕〔many others〕
〔Gain Knowledge〕〔Understand the world〕
〔Get along〕〔With everyone〕"

"〔However〕〔I speak〕〔To others〕
〔Run away〕〔Is what they do〕
〔It's a little〕〔Tough〕"
"１．Not frightening at all"
"２．I believe you can do it"

"<%me> is right, Rela isn't at fault.
The one at fault, is this cowardly assistant!"

"Come on, Light。
How long are you going to act like this."
"I.. I am not as eager as my professor, nor as strong as <%me>."
"Honestly, I am afraid that you would to attack me, not that it's anyone's idea..."
"I apologize for making you feel uncomfortable about yourself."
"However."
"As frightening or scary you may be, I do not wish to give up the chance to understand each other."

"〔I am〕〔scary〕
〔However〕〔you still wish to〕
〔speak to me?〕"

"Y..Y-Yes..
It is shameless of me to ask of this
I guess huh...? "

"Rela, my apologies.
It can't be helped that he is cowardly in nature."
"He finally summoned up his courage for this moment, can you forgive and give in to him?"

"〔This time〕〔Didn't run away〕
〔Therefore〕〔I〕〔Believe you〕"

"〔Nice to meet you〕〔Light〕
〔I am〕〔Rela of clan Ko〕〔Dragonkin's Priestess〕"
"Nice to meet you too."
